# AVPlayerViewControllerSkippingBehavior.default

**Case**

The default skipping behavior, which is to skip forward or backward in 10-second intervals.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Skipping Behaviors

- **AVPlayerViewControllerSkippingBehavior.skipItem**: Skipping behavior that specifies skipping to the next or previous item in the player’s playlist.

items.description: Skipping behavior that specifies skipping to the next or previous item in the player’s playlist.
items.name: AVPlayerViewControllerSkippingBehavior.skipItem
